challenges.name: CSP1
challenges.desc:
Shame on Shou if his web app has XSS vulnerability. More shame on him if he does not know how to use CSP correctly.

This challenge requires user interaction. Send your payload to uv.ctf.so Flag is in cookies of admin (Shou).

Hint: Search Content-Security-Policy if you don't know what that is and check your browser console.

challenges.name: CSP2
challenges.desc:
Shame on Shou if he uses CSP incorrectly. More shame on him if he solely uses CSP to prevent XSS.

This challenge requires user interaction. Send your payload to uv.ctf.so Flag is in cookies of admin (Shou).

challenges.name: Cache
challenges.desc: Arrogant Shou thinks Django is the worst web framework and decided to use it like Flask. To support some business logics, he developed some middlewares and added to the Flask-ish Django. One recent web app he developed with this is to display flag to admins. Help us retrieve the flag :)

challenges.name: Coin Exchange
challenges.desc: Shou lost a few thousand bucks on cryptocurrency. So, he decided to fake a crypto exchange and steal all the money of the users next week. Try break Shou's evil plan by stealing all his money.

challenges.name: Gallery
challenges.desc: It is soothing to fill the whole browser with image you like.

challenges.name: Phish
challenges.desc: Shou is so dumb that he leaks his password (flag) to a phishing website.

challenges.name: SDN
challenges.desc: Shou has server-fetish. There is a specifc server really important to Shou and Shou talks to her everyday. We fail to capture Shou's traffic but we found this weird file on his router. Help us find Shou's love.
